original_text: This is why Joshua had to circumcise them: All the men who were old enough to fight when they came out of Egypt had now died. They died in the desert as they travelled to Canaan.
korean_text: 여호수아가 할례를 시행한 까닭은 이것이니 애굽에서 나온 모든 백성 중 남자 곧 모든 군사는 애굽에서 나온 후 광야 길에서 죽었는데

sentences.original_text: This is why Joshua had to circumcise them
sentences.korean_translation: 이것이 여호수아가 그들에게 할례를 행해야 했던 이유입니다

sentences.original_text: All the men who were old enough to fight
when they came out of Egypt
